ADS.Text1: Prepare for a creepy and brain-wracking horror story! This game will bring you to an event that happened with two young kids
ADS.Text2: One day, they were having fun and playing. Then they heard that an ice cream cab is in the town. Oh well, this means that the time has come to have some ice cream!
ADS.Text3: They never thought that this will end with a horrible adventure when their lives are in danger. So the two boys run to the car, meet a nice fellow who sells them some tasty ice cream
ADS.Text4: then one of the boys disappears. He is your friend and the last thing you can see is an ice cream seller taking him inside of the cab. The scene was not very friendly
ADS.Text5: your pall seemed to be covered with ice and the man had a creepy expression on his face. Where are his politeness and adorable smile?
ADS.Text6: It seems like you became a victim of a hidden psycho-maniac. He planned to kidnap both of you, but you have noticed that and that is why you are still here
ADS.Text7: The game is full of challenging puzzles that will make turn your logical skills on. Be attentive and try to solve the puzzles carefully while avoiding the ice cream man.
ADS.Text8: Rate Us 5 Stars And Download Ice Cream Horror Clue and Let's start your endless journey with the Ice Cream and seek game and enjoy endless fun!
